about_the_game:
Support the team behind free-to-play exploration game, Marie’s Room.
This is the Artbook, part of the Supporter Package.
We highly recommend to first play the game before taking a look at the Artbook.

The Marie’s Room Artbook is a 21 page PDF from the art team behind the narrative exploration game, Marie’s Room. The art book provides a unique look at the development process of the game, with never-before-seen sketches alongside some of the original concepts for the title. Also featured is Marie’s Journal, including each of her carefully curated pages, and the inspirations for their inclusion. We hope that browsing through the pages of the book helps bring you closer to the game and the team behind it.

The Artbook is located in the game install folder.
